item.title: Improving Model Performance
item.description: Orthogonalization Chain of assumptions in Machine Learning Fit training set well on cost function $$ \downarrow $$ Fit dev set well on cost function $$ \downarrow $$ Fit test set well on cost function $$ \downarrow $$ Performs well in real world Single Number Evaluation Metric In this chart we have 2 different classifier and we have the precision and recall value. Notice that the A’s precision is lower than B but Recall is higher.
